overview: Adria Rae is sick of dealing with her boring, normal life and her nagging parents. Her mom wants her to go back to college, which she just dropped out of, and her dad wants her to get a job so she can cover her own bills leaving Adria just wanting to escape.  The year is 2060, the world is recovering from a devastating nuclear war that wiped out most of the population. The remaining females figured out a way to create artificial sperm and in a secret meeting decided they decided to outlaw the male gender.  In the year 2040 sex workers have been replaced with artificial intelligence sexbots that can be programmed exactly however the client wants them to be.  In the year 2030, to combat over population the government has revoked the reproductive rights of ordinary citizens and does not allow them to marry or have children with whoever they want.
tagline: Sex is different in the future...
title: Dark Mirror
